mapper.sql: id, taskdesc, taskname, starttime, endtime, childeva, self_assessment
mapper.select: select taskname, starttime, endtime,actualfinishtime from t_task where taskowner=#{taskowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND taskname LIKE concat("%",#{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%") AND actualfinishtime is not null AND DATE(endtime)>=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 6 DAY) order by endtime
select taskdesc, taskname, starttime, endtime,id from t_task where taskowner=#{taskowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and actualfinishtime is null order by endtime
mapper.insert: insert into t_task (taskdesc, taskname, taskowner,starttime, endtime,tasktype) values (#{taskdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{tasktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update t_task
taskdesc = #{taskdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskname = #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
childeva = #{childeva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
self_assessment = #{selfAssessment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actualfinishtime = #{actualfinishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
parentcheck = #{parentcheck,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_task set taskdesc = #{taskdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskname = #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, childeva = #{childeva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, self_assessment = #{selfAssessment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actualusingtime = #{actualusingtime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, parentcheck = #{parentcheck,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where taskowner = #{taskowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_task set taskdesc = #{taskdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskname = #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, childeva = #{childeva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, self_assessment = #{selfAssessment,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
